title: Liquid fertiliser applicator for seed drills/planters 6m
summary: Liquid fertiliser applicator for seed drills, with minimum 6m drilling or planting width.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a liquid fertiliser applicator for seed drills
eligible.eligibleBullet02: incorporate the solution into the soil as part of the drilling or planting process
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have a minimum 6m drilling or planting width
eligible.eligibleBullet06: have a drill mounted liquid distribution manifold
eligible.eligibleBullet08: have a nozzle and pump flush system
eligible.eligibleBullet09: apply the solution at different rates using built in calibration
eligible.eligibleBullet10: have a system to prevent nozzles from blocking or a liquid blockage monitoring system
eligible.eligibleText01: Applicators that use surface application of liquid fertiliser or liquid chemicals such as herbicides and fungicides are not eligible.
